name: subgid

⊢ (c0 ∈ Grp → c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c1 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp →(c0[|`s]c1)∈ Grp)
⊣ (c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ⊆ c1 ∧(c0[|`s]c1)∈ Grp))
